title: Shame
verses: Romans 8:1 (WEB) — “Now no condemnation for those in Christ Jesus.”
Psalm 34:5 (WEB) — “They looked to him… their faces were not ashamed.”
Isaiah 54:4 (WEB) — “Don’t be afraid, for you will not be ashamed.”
Hebrews 12:2 (WEB) — “He endured the cross, despising its shame.”
body: Shame says ‘I am unlovable’; the gospel says ‘You are beloved in Christ.’ Bring your story into the light and let God rename you.
prayer: Jesus, who bore my shame, cover me with Your honor. Heal my memories and root my identity in Your love. Amen.
